name: Reflection (itch) (doctorphi)
description:
Dodge deadly lasers in this action-packed 2D game! 

HOW TO PLAY

Move with WASD or arrow keys, and press Space/X to dash and destroy enemy turrets! Survive for as long as you can!

INFO

My submission for the ScoreSpace Jam #13 (Theme: Dodge, Optional Challenge: One Room): https://itch.io/jam/scorejam13

Assets used: https://pastebin.com/ejCkFs4M
